To help you determine your body fat status, a easy to use internet application is developed.Use the shiny apps and enter your height and weight and the application will determine your body mass index.

This app will be particularly useful for

- Monitoring the impact of a exercise program  
- Answering questions about your weight and the impact of body fat  
- Setting goals  

Hope you enjoy the application and find good health and happiness.
